overview_of_class: Jazz 1 is an introduction to the basics of Jazz dance, employing the stylistic variance that has always occurred with Jazz, popular music, and dance. A combination of ballet based technical exercises, isolated movement, extended work in demi-plié, embodied syncopation, weight change, and rhythmic work, will be the focus of this introduction.
name: Jazz l
title: SoC DANCE 160-0-21 Jazz l

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Jazz 1 is an introduction to the basics of Jazz dance, employing the stylistic variance that has always occurred with Jazz, popular music, and dance. A combination of ballet based technical exercises, isolated movement, extended work in demi-plié, embodied syncopation, weight change, and rhythmic work, will be the focus of this introduction.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: A basic knowledge of Jazz dance terminology, an ability to organize the body with basic rhythmic and intentional structure, increased ability to focus on and reproduce movement passages in basic Jazz dance, and embody rhythmic structures through isolated movement, footwork, and space.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Very fitted non-restrictive dance clothes, dance shoes-no sneakers

subject: DANCE
